com.software.reuze

Class d_ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.d_ArrayUtils

  • public final class d_ArrayUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for array operations.
    Author:
    Marvin Froehlich (aka Qudus)

        Returns:
        true, if the array contains the specified element.

      • contains

        public static final boolean contains(Object[] array,
               int start,
               int limit,
               Object element,
               boolean strict)
        Checks, if the specified array contains the specified element.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to check
        start - the index in the source array to start the search at
        limit - the index in the source array of the last element to be tested
        element - the element to search
        strict - if true, a == check is used to identify the element, otherwise, the equals method is used.
        Returns:
        true, if the array contains the specified element.

      • contains

        element - the element to search

        public static final int indexOf(byte[] array,
          int start,
          int limit,
          byte element)
        Searches the specified element inside the specified array.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to check
        start - the index in the source array to start the search at
        limit - the index in the source array of the last element to be tested
        element - the element to search
        Returns:
        the element's index within the array or -1, if the array does not contain the specified element.
